mapper.sql: id, order_number, customer_id, price, create_date, product_number, status, address
mapper.select: select o.id,o.order_number,o.price,o.create_date,o.address,o.product_number,o.status from t_order o left join t_customer t on o.customer_id = t.id where o.customer_id = #{customerId} and o.status != 5 order by o.create_date desc

select o.id,o.order_number,o.price,o.create_date,o.address,o.product_number,o.status from t_order o left join t_customer t on o.customer_id = t.id where o.customer_id = #{customerId} and o.status = #{status} order by o.create_date desc

select o.id,o.order_number,o.price,o.create_date,o.address,o.product_number,o.status,c.id'c.id',c.name from t_order o left join t_customer c ON o.customer_id = c.id where order_number = #{orderNo} and customer_id = #{customerId} and o.status != 5 order by o.create_date desc

select o.id,o.order_number,o.price,o.create_date,o.address,o.product_number,o.status,c.id'c.id',c.name from t_order o left join t_customer c ON o.customer_id = c.id where order_number = #{outTradeNo} order by o.create_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_order (order_number, customer_id, price, create_date, product_number, status, address) values (#{orderNumber},#{customer.id},#{price},#{createDate},#{productNumber},#{status},#{address})
